amendment.description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds to implement the Climate Corp.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement the Civilian Climate Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 216 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 216 (Roll no. 429).
